explains: adj. 不自在的，难为情的；自觉的，刻意的

sentences.en: I felt a bit self-conscious in my bikini.
sentences.cn: 穿着比基尼，我感到有点难为情。

sentences.en: He's always been self-conscious about being so short.
sentences.cn: 他老为自己身材矮小而觉得难为情。

sentences.en: The humour of the play is self-conscious and contrived.
sentences.cn: 这部剧的幽默是刻意而为的，而且牵强做作。
